name: Rabbet
headline: Bringing efficiency, accuracy and transparency to construction finance
description:
Rabbet brings efficiency, accuracy and transparency to the complex construction finance industry. The platform uses machine learning to parse documents and connect information for reduced administrative burden, verifiable compliance, and faster decision-making for real estate lenders and developers.

Formerly Contract Simply.

# The Enterprise Alignment Platform For Construction Finance
Efficiently manage project and portfolio risk, drive greater efficiencies, and gain increased portfolio visibility 
[LET'S TALK](http://rabbet.com/</request-meeting/>)
![Rabbet Construction Finance Platform slider web v](https://rabbet.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Rabbet-Construction-Finance-Platform-slider-web-v2.webp)
## Over $100B of project capital is managed in Rabbet today.
![golub logo web png](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20115%2038'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
![faceabaabab jpeg](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20165%2086'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
![Artboard png](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20120%2082'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
![PRG Logo jpg](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20150%2031'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
![email signature png](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20110%2073'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
![Copy of Happy Valentines Day from Rabbet × in e png](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20175%2070'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
![Berkadia logo web qudhhllbthbsnpshhdfacuvylovbtu](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20200%2066'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
![streamlogo png](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20125%2036'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
## Solutions built around your business goals.
### Manage Your Entire Portfolio in One System
### Rabbet for Developers
Built by real estate experts, Rabbet enables developers to gain insight into their portfolio and project data, manage risk effectively, and increase efficiency through automation.
[Explore Why Developers Choose Rabbet >](http://rabbet.com/</rabbet-for-real-estate-developers/>)
![solutions rabbet for developers web x](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20768%20432'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
![solutions rabbet for lenders web x](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20768%20432'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Real-time collaboration for efficient risk management
### Rabbet for Lenders
Increase team efficiency by simplifying document handling, tracking covenants, and enhancing communication while ensuring robust system controls and hierarchy of approvals. 
[Explore Why Lenders Choose Rabbet >](http://rabbet.com/</rabbet-for-construction-lenders/>)
### Delight your clients 
### Rabbet for Development Services
Rabbet provides a tech-enabled experience sure to delight your clients with centralized, accurate, easy-to-access, and organized project information.
[Explore Why Development Services Choose Rabbet >](http://rabbet.com/</real-estate-development-software/>)
![solutions rabbet for development services web x](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20768%20432'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
![solutions rabbet for loan services web x](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20768%20438'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Your competitive advantage
### Rabbet for Construction Loan Servicers
Differentiate yourself by leveraging Rabbet’s project dashboards and insights that help you highlight elevated risk and enable data-driven decision-making. 
[Explore Explore Why Loan Servicers Choose Rabbet >](http://rabbet.com/</construction-finance-software-loan-servicers/>)
## Success stories from industry leaders.
![Kairoi](http://rabbet.com/wp-content/plugins/revslider/sr6/assets/assets/dummy.png) Instant visibility into project finances with 75% less time spent managing draws and reporting  We put Rabbet through the wringer and we’re very happy with it. We can log in from anywhere, see all projects at a high-level, then drill down to see contingency and how much we have left in the budget. Kairoi ![kairoi lighter](http://rabbet.com/wp-content/plugins/revslider/sr6/assets/assets/dummy.png) [LEARN MORE ](http://rabbet.com/</rabbet-for-real-estate-developers/>) ![Baltimore Community Lending](http://rabbet.com/wp-content/plugins/revslider/sr6/assets/assets/dummy.png) 300% higher construction loan volume without increasing headcount  Our loan volume was increasing from 15 per year to 50 or 60 at one time. 15 to 60 is a big jump and I needed something that could speed it up. Rabbet was the only solution that met those needs. Baltimore Community Lending ![bcl](http://rabbet.com/wp-content/plugins/revslider/sr6/assets/assets/dummy.png) [LEARN MORE ](http://rabbet.com/</rabbet-for-construction-lenders/>) ![Track West Partners](http://rabbet.com/wp-content/plugins/revslider/sr6/assets/assets/dummy.png) Better alignment between software and operations after migration to Rabbet from an alternative solution and 4x faster draws  Rabbet’s document organization component makes it so easy to go from a high level view of the document to a granular view of the information because Rabbet puts the details side-by-side with the document. Track West Partners ![track west partners web](http://rabbet.com/wp-content/plugins/revslider/sr6/assets/assets/dummy.png) [LEARN MORE ](http://rabbet.com/</real-estate-development-software/>) ![Altus Realty](http://rabbet.com/wp-content/plugins/revslider/sr6/assets/assets/dummy.png) 4X faster draw process with complete budget visibility for employees and partners  Rabbet allows you to make projects run smoother and more efficiently. I process four draws in a day, whereas without Rabbet I would be lucky to get through one. Altus Realty ![altus reality web](http://rabbet.com/wp-content/plugins/revslider/sr6/assets/assets/dummy.png) [LEARN MORE ](http://rabbet.com/</real-estate-development-software/>) ![Redrock Residential](http://rabbet.com/wp-content/plugins/revslider/sr6/assets/assets/dummy.png) Starting a development firm that scales with savings estimated at $20-30k per project each year  Now Rabbet makes us really efficient. It gives us immediate knowledge in a platform that is really easy to use and view. It’s a spreadsheet on steroids. Redrock Residential ![Redrock Logo](http://rabbet.com/wp-content/plugins/revslider/sr6/assets/assets/dummy.png) [LEARN MORE ](http://rabbet.com/</rabbet-for-real-estate-developers/>)

generated_description:
**Rabbet Overview**

Rabbet is a forward-thinking startup in the construction finance sector, based in Austin, Texas. Founded in 2017 and originally known as Contract Simply, the company gained traction by joining the Y Combinator startup accelerator in the Summer 2017 batch. The goal of Rabbet is straightforward: to bring efficiency, accuracy, and transparency to the notoriously complex world of construction finance.

**Core Mission and Technology**

Rabbet’s platform utilizes machine learning to streamline what has traditionally been a cumbersome process. By parsing through various documents and linking information, Rabbet eases the administrative burden, ensures compliance is verifiable, and speeds up decision-making for both real estate lenders and developers. The company’s commitment to transforming construction finance not only enhances productivity but also builds trust through clearer financial processes.

**Target Audience**

Rabbet serves multiple stakeholders in the construction industry:
- **Developers** looking for efficiencies in managing portfolios and risks.
- **Lenders** aiming to boost team efficiency by simplifying document management and enhancing communication.
- **Development Services** that benefit from a more organized way to present project data to clients.
- **Loan Servicers**, who gain a competitive advantage through improved visibility and risk management tools.

**Product Suite**

The company offers targeted solutions tailored to these audiences:
- **Rabbet for Real Estate Developers**: Streamlined project data insights and risk management capabilities.
- **Rabbet for Construction Lenders**: Enhanced document handling and approval processes.

**Team and Growth**

With a small but effective team of 23 employees, Rabbet is making significant strides in the industry, managing over $100 billion in project capital. They emphasize collaboration and constant improvement, underpinned by their mission to reduce non-productive tasks and ensure better project financial outcomes for their clients.

**Conclusion**

Rabbet exemplifies how technology can transform traditional industries. Their innovative approach not only simplifies construction finance but also enhances communication and decision-making, making them a key player to watch as they continue to scale. For more information, visit [Rabbet's website](http://rabbet.com).
